title: Do you mention the name of the person while writing action items in the minutes of a meeting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, absolutely. Action Items needs to be assigned to the right person and it must have a due date. You can take a look at the Meetings and Action Items Management tool from Wizergos. It is a complete Meeting solution from scheduling to running the meetings to tracking. During the meeting you can use the real time collaboration screen to write down action items, minutes of meetings, decisions taken in the meeting and all these will be available to you and also will get emailed out to all attendees at the end of the meeting.
